sentences.en: Amy discovered that the theoretical and written work came easily to her.
sentences.cn: 埃米发现理论和笔头作业对她来说十分容易。

sentences.en: Aristotle’s theoretical model of the universe
sentences.cn: 亚里士多德有关宇宙的理论模型

sentences.en: He became the head of the Kaiser Whilhem Institute of Theoretical Physics.
sentences.cn: 他成了威廉国王的物理理论研究所的所长.

sentences.en: He claims that the writer never consciously formulated his own theoretical position.
sentences.cn: 他声称该作家从未有意识地阐明他自己的理论见解.

sentences.en: I had a theoretical reverence and homage for beauty, elegance, gallantry, fascination.
sentences.cn: 我对于美 、 文雅 、 勇敢 、 魅力,抱有一种理论上的崇敬.

sentences.en: In conclusion, more theoretical and experimental research must be conducted.
sentences.cn: 总之, 必须进一步开展理论和试验研究.

sentences.en: In this process, an interaction of theoretical study with practical work . should be strengthened.
sentences.cn: 在这个过程中，要加强理论的探讨和工作推进的互动作用。

sentences.en: It's a theoretical matter as well as a practical one.
sentences.cn: 这不仅是个实践问题,也是个理论问题.

sentences.en: It's only a theoretical possibility.
sentences.cn: 这只是一种假设的可能性.

sentences.en: Marxism possesses the theoretical character of keeping pace with the times.
sentences.cn: 马克思主义具有与时俱进的理论品格.

sentences.en: Much of this research was also plagued by methodological problems theoretical ambiguities.
sentences.cn: 这类研究的大部分同样受到方法学的问题和理论不明确的干扰.

sentences.en: Rather, speculation, conflicts, and theoretical extrapolation typify their every action.
sentences.cn: 相反, 怀疑 、 冲突和理论上的推断是他们每步行为的特征.

sentences.en: Researchers have tossed around theoretical calculations of using just aluminum and water for rocket propellant in the past.
sentences.cn: 研究者在过去辗转不安的进行理论计算，仅仅只用铝和水作为火箭燃料。

sentences.en: She has theoretical knowledge of teaching, but no practical experience.
sentences.cn: 她有教学方面的理论知识，但没有实际经验。

sentences.en: The course is essentially theoretical in orientation.
sentences.cn: 该课程的目标基本上是理论性的。

sentences.en: The theoretical question is the subject of two rival doctrines.
sentences.cn: 这一理论问题是两个对立学派的争论焦点.

sentences.en: theoretical physics
sentences.cn: 理论物理

sentences.en: There was undeniably a strong theoretical dimension to his thinking.
sentences.cn: 不可否认，他的思想很有理论深度。

sentences.en: These fears are purely theoretical.
sentences.cn: 这些担忧纯粹是臆测出来的。

sentences.en: These findings have both theoretical and practical applications.
sentences.cn: 这些发现具有理论和实际的应用。

sentences.en: This is certainly a theoretical risk but in practice there is seldom a problem.
sentences.cn: 从理论上讲，这肯定是有风险的，可是实际上很少出问题。

words.tran_cn: 理论家，精通于理论的人
理论的,抽象的,理想的,假设的

trans.tran_cn: 理论的，推想的，假设的，空论的
trans.tran_en: relating to the study of ideas, especially scientific ideas, rather than with practical uses of the ideas or practical experience
